data.title: Arlberg hotel Top location in Pettneu close to St. Anton
data.meta_description: In the heart of the Arlberg mountains, our 3-star superior hotel Alpina in Pettneu welcomes you with traditional charm & a unique Alpine living experience
data.text:
Hotel Alpina is a celebration of the mountains, of life, and, most importantly: you. Guests notice this the moment they enter the hotel and are met with a genuine smile from one of our attentive employees. Every member of our team is personally committed to making your holiday a memorable one. Rejuvenate and revive on the sunny side of the Arlberg mountains, where you can breathe, rest, and relax between stunning mountain panoramas and pristine nature. Fresh, feel-good cuisine, a peaceful spa, and Tyrolean ambience are here to make your break complete. Experience the traditional attitude towards life in the Alpine village of Pettneu, a place worth discovering, as you enjoy the outstanding service provided by our hotel at the Arlberg. We are conveniently located near the St. Anton ski resort and at the heart of the local hiking hub â€“ ensuring you various opportunities for year-round recreation.

Breathe in the fresh mountain air, indulge in a glass of fine wine, dine in rustic parlours, relax near the romantic open fireplace, and take in superb views of the surrounding mountains. These are only a few of the highlights you can experience during holidays at Hotel Alpina in Pettneu at the famous Arlberg massif.

Use our online booking platform and get the best prices.

Hotel Alpina makes it easy for you to decide where to spend your next holiday. Attractive holiday offers and package deals give you plenty of opportunity to experience the various seasons in the Arlberg in one adventure-packed holiday. This allows you to save time for what really counts: enjoying your holiday.
